doc.title: White Knuckle Ride
doc.plot: High atop one of the world's tallest volcanoes, the lives of one married couple will be forever changed. Lloyd and Sarah Bridges are trying to fix a crumbling marriage by celebrating their fifth anniversary in Hawaii. Avid cyclists, they ride up the twisting ten-mile road of Mt Haleakala at the break of dawn to enjoy the misty crater alone. But what they see up there instead sends them on a white knuckle bike ride back down the slope for their lives. WKR is an Indie rollercoaster ride and an Eco-friendly production.
